data.content: In this lesson, you will attempt a variety of comprehension activities based on two stories titled Grandma's Glasses and Ramya's Stars.

• You will listen to audios to follow specific sequence of events and understand specific details in the stories.
  • You will describe objects and answers questions about personal preferences.
  • You will read stories to understand them and use them in simple sentences.
  • You will also write simple sentences and answers to questions based on the two stories.
